dcterms:creator: Paul Bergmann
Michael Fauser
David Sattlegger
Carsten Steger
dcterms:description: MVTec AD is a comprehensive real-world dataset for unsupervised anomaly detection, containing 5 texture and 10 object categories stemming from manufacturing with a total of 5354 images. It provides normal images for training and both normal and anomaly images with various types of defects for testing, along with pixel-level annotations for defective test images.
dcterms:title: MVTec AD

dcterms:creator: A Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR10 is a dataset containing 50,000 training images and 10,000 test images across 10 categories, used for one-class novelty detection where one category is treated as normal data and the others as novelty.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10
